title: New & MPfree: Shades – Hard Fall
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/53620652-1.jpg "Shades")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7171-new-mpfree-shades-hard-fall/attachment/53620652-1) Hard Fall, the first track by Arizona Boise four piece Shades is a blissed out affair, whilst proving joyfully trippy in parts. There are elements of chillwave, pop and electronic influences, ultimately producing a hazy, yet thoroughly listenable track. Released through HolyPage Records as a free download, it certainly sets the bar high for Shades, and personally I’m extremely excited to see what they can conjure up next. Listen to and download Hard Fall below. Hard Fall by HolyPageRecords
